scripts.build: bun run build:base && docker build --build-arg BASE_IMAGE=tee-rex-base -t tee-rex --platform linux/amd64 .
scripts.build:nitro: bun run build:base && docker build --build-arg BASE_IMAGE=tee-rex-base -f Dockerfile.nitro -t tee-rex-nitro --platform linux/amd64 .
scripts.lint: biome check . && shellcheck infra/*.sh infra/tofu/*.sh && bun run lint:tofu && bun run lint:pkg
scripts.lint:tofu: command -v tofu >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo 'Skipping: tofu not installed'; exit 0; }; cd infra/tofu && tofu fmt -check -diff .
scripts.test: bun run lint && bun run test:typecheck && bun run test:unit
scripts.test:all: bun run test && bun run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: bun run --cwd packages/sdk test:e2e && bun run --cwd packages/app test:e2e:all
scripts.test:typecheck: bun run --cwd packages/sdk test:lint && bun run --cwd packages/server typecheck
scripts.test:unit: bun run --cwd packages/sdk test:unit && bun run --cwd packages/server test:unit && bun run --cwd packages/app test:unit
